alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern DeSoto and southeastern Shelby Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Germantown, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, Cordova, Memphis, Capleville and Fairhaven. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
